title: Patch Notes
content: elûnite Robe on all races so that gloves now correctly hide the sleeves when worn. Fixed a rogue occluder in the Hollow, letting you see the waters beneath the earth at certain angles. Fixed Morgan's sleeves clipping through her gloves. Adjusted the Dark Justiciar Half-Plate for female characters, which, when worn without underwear underneath it, was letting the nips peek through. Gave Bunny and Blossom - two very much human children in the Lower City - clothes fit for humans. Without tail holes
